name: SKReceiptRefreshRequest
desc: A request to refresh the receipt, which represents the user's transactions with your app.

items.name: init(receiptProperties: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Initializes a receipt refresh request with optional properties.

items.name: let SKReceiptPropertyIsExpired: String
items.desc: A key whose value indicates whether the receipt is expired.

items.name: let SKReceiptPropertyIsRevoked: String
items.desc: A key whose value indicates whether the receipt has been revoked.

items.name: let SKReceiptPropertyIsVolumePurchase: String
items.desc: A key whose value indicates whether the receipt is a Volume Purchase Plan receipt.
